title: Extra bonus RP is now enabled
body:
Hey everyone,

We made a mistake with the extra bonus RP announcement in that we used the US prices and times. Really sorry about this :(

The sale is live now, anyone that redeemed RP on January 12 before 12:30 PM AEDT will have their extra bonus RP added in the next few days.

This sale will be running through to 6:59 PM AEDT on January 19.

You can see more details about it in the live article: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/extra-bonus-rp-here-limited-time

Again, really sorry for the mixup. We need to do better for you guys.

replies.body: watch out rito is trying to scam the free rp from u, wait another day or so before u redeem the RP

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=sdH2s6eG,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-01-12T01:59:57.941+0000)
>
> We need to do better for you guys.

Not to be that guy, but ive heard this before...
